author: Opinion by Simona Siri
title: I watched as US largely ignored Italy's suffering
description: When on March 13 my husband, Dan, came down with Covid-19 symptoms — high fever, dry cough, chills — my first reaction was rage, and then panic. Rage because I had spent the previous two weeks telling him to wash his hands and stay home, close the office, don…
content: Simona Siri is an Italian journalist and writer based in New York City. She writes regularly for Vanity Fair Italy and the Italian newspaper La Stampa. Follow her on Twitter @simonasiri. The views expressed in this commentary are her own. View more opinion at… [+4702 chars]
